Real-time Feature Tracker Library Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
_featureA feature point
_feature_listList of features in a single image
_FeatureServerContextParameters for UDP feature server. Use with class FeatureServer
_FeatureTrackerContextParameters for feature tracking
_OCVTrackingContextParameters specific to OpenCV tracker (for use with FeatureTrackerOCV class)
_PXCContextParameters for the PXC200AF framegrabber. Use with class PXCCaptureLoop
_rgbRGB pixel data type, 8 bits per channel (24 bpp). Use with class Pixmap
CountFPSA frames-per-second counter
FeatureClientA UDP network client for FeatureServer
FeatureServerA UDP network server for feature tracker
FeatureTrackerKLTAutomatic image feature detection and tracking using the Lucas-Kanade tracking algorithm implemented in the KLT library
FeatureTrackerOCVAutomatic image feature detection and tracking using the OpenCV library implementation of the Lucas-Kanade tracking algorithm
Pixmap< T >The template class for pixmap (ppm, pgm) images
PixmapGrayClass for 1 byte-per-pixel greyscale (pgm) images
PixmapRgbClass for 3 bytes-per-pixel RGB (ppm) images
PXCCaptureLoopA QNX specific interface to capture images using the Imagenation PXC200AF frame grabber
SDLWindowA window for image display
Created for project Real-time Feature Tracker Library on Thu Sep 14 20:30:15 EDT 2006
for Vilas Kumar Chitrakaran (cvilas(@)ces.clemson.edu).
